name: Appditto
description: We're a team of 2 building widely used Nano projects since 2017. Our work includes [Natrium](https://natrium.io), [The Nano Tip Bot](https://github.com/bbedward/graham_discord_bot), [Natricon](https://natricon.com), [Pippin](https://github.com/appditto/pippin_nano_wallet) and [Nano Dart](https://github.com/appditto/nanodart).
